attributes.action: Make smoking descanted areas for smokers to go when on break/want to smoke
attributes.background: Make smoking areas in town city ect for people to smoke in instead of smoking outside shops going into people and children's faces and lungs

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. Town and city centres are the responsibility of local councils. 

You could start a new petition asking Parliament to change the law, to require local councils to provide smoking areas in towns and cities. 

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
